casebody.data:

v.
WELLS FARGO INSURANCE SERVICES USA, INC., Defendant Below, Appellee. No. 401, 2017 Supreme Court of Delaware. Submitted: April 11, 2018

Revised: April 17, 2018

AFFIRMED.
